      • debtAllEvenly

        public void debtAllEvenly()
        Literally splits every item cost evenly between all available participants. We might want to revisit how useful this even is...

      • debtItemEvenly

        public void debtItemEvenly(Item item,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Participant> participants)
        Clear any existing payers set for item, and then evenly split that item cost among the specified participants.
        Parameters:
        item -
        participants -

      • debtAddParticipant

        public void debtAddParticipant(Item item,
                      Participant p)
        Using this method ASSUMES that you want to split debt evenly between the participants currently assigned to the item and the new participant p. It will reset any custom payment values for all other participants already assigned to pay for item to an even split between all involved.
        Parameters:
        item -
        p -

      • debtRemoveParticipant

        public void debtRemoveParticipant(Item item,
                         Participant p)
        Removes a payer from an item. Does NOT adjust the amounts that other payers are paying for that item (call setPayers() again on the remaining payers to redistribute the amount evenly between them). Also note, this does not remove that participant from the overall transaction; it only zeros their amount for that particular item.
        Parameters:
        item -
        p -

      • debtResetItem

        public void debtResetItem(Item item)
        For a particular item, resets any debt assignments made on it. No participants will have its cost debted to them.
        Parameters:
        item -

      • debtResetParticipant

        public void debtResetParticipant(Participant p)
        Resets a participant's debt for all items. They will owe nothing across the board.
        Parameters:
        p -

      • payGetAmount

        public double payGetAmount(Participant p)

      • payEvenly

        public void payEvenly()
        Every participant pays for an equal amount of the total debt

      • payFairly

        public void payFairly()
        Every participant pays their individual debt

      • payCustom
